clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of the Efficacy and Safety of 2 Oral Doses of Rimonabant, 5 mg/Day or 20 mg/Day, Versus Placebo, as an Aid to Smoking Cessation (STRATUS US)
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of the Efficacy and Safety of 2 Oral Doses of Rimonabant, 5 mg/Day or 20 mg/Day, Versus Placebo, as an Aid to Smoking Cessation (STRATUS US, EFC4964) - A Randomized, Double-blind, 3-arm, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group, Fixed-dose, 52-week, Multi-center Study.

primary_outcome.measure: Prolonged abstinence from tobacco smoking during the last 4 weeks of treatment (Day 43 to Day 70) as reported by direct inquiry of the patient by the Investigator, and confirmed by exhaled carbon monoxide (CO) levels, and plasma cotinine measurements.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of mean change from baseline to last evaluation of the total score of QSU.

Brief scale evaluating craving for tobacco cigarettes and relative change in body weight from baseline to last evaluation in patients with BMI lower than 30 kg/m2 at baseline achieving prolonged abstinence.
